import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css'; import { Table, Divider, Tag } from 'antd'; import axios from 'axios'; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, MDBInput, } from "mdbreact"; import { Tabs, Tab, Form, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import "react-datepicker/dist/react-datepicker.css"; class dvHome extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.editDetails = this.editDetails.bind(this); this.approveApplicaion = this.approveApplicaion.bind(this); this.rejectApplicaion = this.rejectApplicaion.bind(this); this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); } state = { modal2: false, data: {}, }; toggle = nr => () => { console.log(this.state.data); this.editDetails(); let modalNumber = "modal" + nr; this.setState({ [modalNumber]: !this.state[modalNumber] }); }; editDetails(e) { axios({ method: 'POST', url: 'http://localhost:9090/application-processing/dvEditApplicationPersonalDetails', //contentType: "application/json", data: {id : e.target.id}, //config: { headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json' }}} }) .then(response => { //handle success window.alert("success"); var temp1 = response.data; this.state.data = temp1; let modalNumber = "modal" + 2; this.setState({ [modalNumber]: !this.state[modalNumber] }); // console.log(temp1); }) .catch(response=>{ //handle error console.log(response); }); } rejectApplicaion(e) { axios({ method: 'POST', url: 'http://localhost:9090/application-processing/dvRejectedLoans', //contentType: "application/json", data: e.target.id, //config: { headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json' }}} }) .then(function (response) { //handle success window.alert("success"); window.location.reload(); //window.location.assign("http://localhost:3000/form3?ID="+response.data); }) .catch(function (response) { //handle error console.log(response); }); } approveApplicaion(e) { axios({ method: 'POST', url: 'http://localhost:9090/application-processing/dvApprovedLoans', //contentType: "application/json", data: e.target.id, //config: { headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json' }}} }) .then(response => { //handle success window.alert("success"); window.location.reload(); //window.location.assign("http://localhost:3000/form3?ID="+response.data); console.log(this.state.data); }) .catch(response =>{ //handle error console.log(response); }); } componentDidMount() { axios.get(`http://localhost:9090/application-processing/dvRecievedApplications`) .then(res => { // const posts = res.data.data.children.map(obj => obj.data); //console.log(res.data); var temp1 = res.data; if(temp1){ for(var i=0;i         ; temp1["rows"][i][temp1["button"][j]["key"]] = button1; } this.setState(temp1); //console.log(res.data); } } }); } render(){ const header={display:'flex', justifyContent:'center', backgroundColor:'#f5f5f5' } //console.log(this.state); const columns = this.state['columns']; const data = this.state['rows']; return (
